meanings.sent1: The soap was foamable, creating bubbles easily.
meanings.sent2: The foamable shampoo lathered up nicely in my hair.
meanings.sent3: The foamable bath bubbles made bath time more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like foamable bubbles, rising rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The foamable liquid expanded like a growing cloud.

meanings.sent1: The foamable material expanded when mixed with air.
meanings.sent2: The foamable mixture hardened into a light, airy texture.
meanings.sent3: The foamable cake batter rose beautifully in the oven.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were foamable, expanding and filling the room.
meanings.sent5: The foamable insulation filled every crack, sealing the house.
